phrases: Do not worry, you are just entangled in them.
Just wait until evening, and you will get loose all on your own.
It does not have any fancy name like that!
This scummy planet is like a big trash heap in space.
It does not have any cities, or people, or anything decent to eat or drink.
We were forced down on this planet when we got caught in some cosmic tides.
Our spaceship was smashed up, and we were at our wit's end when you folks showed up.
We were going to swipe your spaceship and get out of here right away,
but unfortunately, there is a gigantic cosmic tidal current in the way,
So, you are saying that you were just killing time up to now?
While you were out, we probed you to find out about Earth,
the secret of the Dragon Balls, and even what Namekians looked like.
Then, the lake, and the giant, and the ice cave were all...
Illusions that we made you see.
W- what kind of despicable joke is this!?
It was pretty thrilling, was not it?
A- as hectic as things are right now-!
In exchange for taking your spaceship,
we just let you have a bit of a dream, did not we?
It is better than being killed, right?
Yeah, we are not the barbaric type.
The cosmic tidal currents move just a little bit each day.
But once in a very rare while, an opening appears in them.
And this fog is our indicator of that.
As long as this fog is out, we can escape.
We are going to search for the Dragon Balls.
We never thought anything in the world could be so amazing.
This time, you guys stay here.
You will wait until someone else comes down on this planet.
Bulma- san, what are you doing!?
Are you saying I should get our stuff back by myself!?
W- well, the way things are...
Hey, by the way, you do know how to fly this, do not you?
You tell this thing to fly, and it flies, all on its own.
They do not know how to open the door, do they?
They are squirming all over, and I am getting nowhere!
If we do not hurry it up, the fog is going to lift!
Why did not you make sure to look into this?
We just need to bring the girl with us, right?
We cannot afford to dally around!
Once the opening in the cosmic tidal currents closes,
there is no telling when it will open again!
L- listen, let us all go together, like friends.
You are saying you want to come with us back to our planet?
So, there is a password, is there?
There is food to eat, if you are not too fussy.
They can be pretty good, depending on how you cook them.
Whew, you are here at last.
D- damn it, if that is how it is going to be...
Oh, wow, they are weaker than I thought.
I told you, we are not barbarians, like you guys are.
The fog is about to lift!
We have to hurry, or the tidal opening will close!
If it were not for you,
we would not have known how to get out of here.
Bulma- san, where is the opening in the cosmic tide?
It is where that gas is blowing through.
Now, we have to make up for lost time.
They were too much for us.
I wonder when the next one will come down here.
Vegeta was hastening along his route toward Planet Namek from a different direction.
l will not let Freeza have it his way any longer.
l will make sure I get the Dragon Balls, just you watch!
It is been a month already, huh?
I forgot to give him some nail clippers.
I would send him some if there were a delivery service.
Y- you were standing guard, huh?
34 days after blasting off from Earth,
Bulma and the others had finally arrived at their destination of Planet Namek.
It is the real one this time, right?
The computer says that this is the genuine Planet Namek.
We got here four days later than we planned.
It is just like those kids said.
It is a good thing we took that shortcut.
Everything turned out all right, did not it?
Now, we are going to land, so sit down and fasten your seatbelts.
There is going to be quite a jolt.
Commence landing in a suitable location.
We have landed on Planet Namek!
I will examine the composition of the atmosphere.
I made sure to install some sensors.
Was not that prudent of me?
We will be lucky enough if there is some level of oxygen here,
but I also prepared some atmospheric masks,
though that will limit our time out there to roughly...
This looks sort of like the place where I trained with Piccolo- san.
Yeah, where we first fought the Saiyans, right?
I suppose a place that was similar to his home would instinctively be more settling.
You guys do not ever learn from your previous lessons, do you!?
How can you just waltz on out here like this!?
You sure are as scary as ever.
Well, it is okay, as long as there are Dragon Balls here.
Oh, I was wondering if we were not being tricked again, so just to make sure...
It is for real, I tell you!
Kuririn- san, there is a strong Ki coming from over there.
I am sensing a lot of them.
Yeah, and they are all incredible Ki, too.
Oh, come on, what are you talking about?
With Kami- sama and Piccolo being as strong as they were,
it is not at all strange that the Namekians from their home
Those Ki do feel a little bit evil, huh?
It is okay, I tell you.
Kaio- sama said that Namekians were gentle by nature, did not he?
There are four Dragon Balls gathered together in that direction.
Come on, let us go meet the Namekians.
I should not have gotten so jittery, huh?
H- have not we seen that someplace before?
He is the only one it could be.
Come to think about it, he knows about the Dragon Balls, too.
The only thing we can do now is return to Earth, right?
If that guy gets the Dragon Balls, it is over.
Bulma- san, please contact Earth and tell them about this, then go on back by yourself.
Me and Gohan will stay here and try to collect the Dragon Balls.
We will have the Dragon Radar.
Once I get back to Earth, I will bring Son- kun on board and come back for you.
The round trip will take a little over two months, though.
Two months will pass like that!
I mean, it is only 60 days!
A little more than two months, right?
I will not let you snatch them away from me!
I should be able to handle everyone besides Freeza,
but I do not stand a chance of winning if I fight him head-to-head.
Whatever happens, I have to get the Balls away from him and gain eternal life.
To think I would be stuck using a Scouter again...
He is brought Zarbon and Dodoria with him too, has he?
So tell that to Son- kun and the others.
Just do not tell Chichi- san.
I already told you... are you listening to me?
What is the matter, you two?
W- why is there another one coming?
T- that is what l'd like to know.
Now there are three more, yes?
At last, the evil hidden hand, Freeza, appears.
Will Gohan and Kuririn indeed be able to collect the Dragon Balls?
